transport.question: I have wheels and can take you places, but I'm smaller than a car. What am I?

hints.text: 🚲 You pedal me with your feet.
👧👦 Kids love to ride me around the park.
🛎️ I often have a bell to let people know I'm coming.

transport.question: I travel on water, and sometimes people live on me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I float.
⚓ I have an anchor to stay in one place.
🚢 I can be big or small, but I'm not a submarine.

transport.question: I have lots of seats and take many people to school or work. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I have a special place to stop for people to get on.
👦👧 I'm often yellow when taking kids to school.
🎫 You might need a ticket to ride me.

transport.question: I fly high in the sky and can take you to faraway lands. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I have wings, but I'm not a bird.
✈️ I need a runway to take off and land.
🌍 I travel long distances.

transport.question: I run on tracks and carry many passengers, sometimes underground. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 I stop at stations.
🚂 I can be very long with many carriages.
⚡ I can run on electricity.

transport.question: I'm a vehicle that helps put out fires. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I'm usually red and have a siren.
🚒 I carry a big hose and lots of water.
🔥 I help people when they are in danger.

transport.question: I am a vehicle used for carrying heavy goods, but I'm not a pickup truck. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I have a large trailer on the back
🛣️ I usually travel long distances on highways
🚛 I'm bigger than a car and often have many wheels

transport.question: I travel on rails in the city, using overhead wires for power. What am I?

hints.text: 🔔 I often have a bell to warn pedestrians.
🚋 I am usually found in cities and stop frequently.
⚡ I get my power from overhead wires.

transport.question: I fly without wings, but with spinning blades on top! What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in the air.
🚑 I can be used as an air ambulance.
⛰️ I can land in difficult places.

transport.question: I travel underwater and can explore the deep ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I can go very far under the sea.
🐠 I have a periscope to see above the water.
⚓ I am like a boat, but for under the sea

plant.question: I have leaves, but I'm not a book. I grow in the ground, but I'm not a potato. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I need water and sunlight to grow.
🌳 I can be big or small, and some even have flowers.
🍃 Animals and humans need oxygen and I help to make it

plant.question: I am a fruit that is long and yellow. Monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys like to eat me.
💛 My color is very bright
🍌 You have to peel me before eating.

plant.question: I have a prickly outside, but my inside is sweet and red. I grow in warm places. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I can hurt you if you don't handle me carefully.
🍉 You can eat me when it's very hot outside
🏖️ You might see me growing in tropical countries

plant.question: I am tall and strong with many leaves and branches. Birds build their nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels like to live in me.
🏡 My wood can be used to build things.
☀️ I need lots of sun and water to grow really tall.

plant.question: I am a vegetable that makes some people cry when they cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I grow underground
😭 I have many layers.
🍲 I am often used when cooking.

plant.question: I have a stem and petals, and bees love to visit me for my sweet nectar. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 People often give me as a gift.
🌻 I come in many different colors and sizes.
🐝 I smell very nice and attract bees!

plant.question: I'm a type of plant that grows along the ground or climbs up walls. I have twisting tendrils. What am I?

hints.text: 🪴 Sometimes people grow me on a trellis.
🍇 Grapes can grow on me.
🧗 I need something to hold onto to grow upward.

plant.question: I am a grain that is used to make bread and pasta. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I grow in fields.
🍞 I can be ground into flour.
🌍 I am a very important food crop in many countries.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when heated. People like to eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I am often covered in butter and salt.
🌽 I come from a specific type of corn.
🔥 You need to heat me up for me to change my shape.

plant.question: I am a type of fungus that is often found growing on logs or in dark, damp places. Some are edible, but others are poisonous. What am I?

hints.text: 🍄 I am neither a plant nor an animal.
🌧️ I grow best after it rains.
🧪 Experts need to examine me to determine if I am safe to eat
